net.grian.spatium.coll

Interface Universe<T>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UniverseImpl

    public interface Universe<T>

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<RayCollision<T>> castRay(Ray ray)
      Casts a ray into the universe and returns a new list containing all the collisions of the ray.
      static <T> Universe<T> create(java.lang.Class<T> handleType)
      Creates a new universe containing a certain type of handles.
      java.util.Set<Collideable> getContent()
      Returns all Collideables in this universe, aka. all obstructions when casting a ray.
      java.lang.Class<T> getHandleType()
      Returns the type of objects contained in this universe.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        static <T> Universe<T> create(java.lang.Class<T> handleType)
        Creates a new universe containing a certain type of handles.
        Parameters:
        handleType - the type of handles
        Returns:
        a new universe
        See Also:
        getHandleType()

      • getHandleType

        java.lang.Class<T> getHandleType()
        Returns the type of objects contained in this universe. For example, entities, blocks, etc.
        Returns:
        the type of objects in the universe

      • getContent

        java.util.Set<Collideable> getContent()
        Returns all Collideables in this universe, aka. all obstructions when casting a ray.
        Returns:
        all collideables in the universe

      • castRay

        java.util.List<RayCollision<T>> castRay(Ray ray)
        Casts a ray into the universe and returns a new list containing all the collisions of the ray.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        all collisions of the ray
